import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './App.css'; import AddBook from './components/AddBook'; import Books from './components/Books'; function App() { const [books, setBooks] = useState([]) const [book, setBook] = useState({ bookName: "", author: "", quantity: "", section: "", comments: "" }) useEffect(() => { fetch('/books').then(res => { if(res.ok){ return res.json() } }).then(jsonRes => setBooks(jsonRes)) }) return (
